Articles.Content: Sorry guys, I guess there was a mix up last time. I was asking to be removed from the list, not bumped to the end. Travelling, don't have KSP here. Whoever's next can go ahead!
Now that .17 is out, who wants to make a Dunabase?
So I guess we can have an interplanetary system of bases now. Who wants to make an Eve base? Plus whoever makes a base on Moho should get a medal!
I love duna, I want to found a base next to the face!
If only people would live up to their requests and actually fly to the bases. Does anyone think we should reset the futer flights list?

Yeah, stuff happens. I am active again though now that .17 came. Sorry about that.

Edited September 23, 2012 by DArkB0mb3rz22

If we're expanding this to interplanetary flights, sign me up for a flight to Laythe. I'd be interested in trying to land a craft on one of the islands. A base, mind you, not just a small 1 kerbal lander.
Someone has to make a new thread but remember whoever makes it has to be on the ball at managing it. I would do it but school takes away my free time.

Well, we could move this to 0.17 and continue from there. We'd need to set a rule for "colonizing" new planets and moons, though. Something like.. at least 5 landings in one base before starting a new one or something similar.
